main.name: To The Home Portal
main.description: A home automation tool that make everyday life easier
main.about: This application sets out to make everyday mundane tasks easier. Through the power of automation and technology, we set out to increase your productivity and allow you to spend this newley found time elsewhere
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here are some of the features our app offers:

skills.name: Featured Backend API
skills.description: Robust backend API allows you the build your own automation against our application

skills.name: Beautiful UI
skills.description: Easy to use user interface allows users to get farmilar with our serivces in an easy way

skills.name: Integration with Popular Services
skills.description: Our web app integrates with your favourite services such as Netflix, Amazon, Apple and many more
